name: EDDO
description:
EDDO is a digital performance optimization agency focused on inbound marketing, specializing in conversion optimization, SEO-SEA, social media marketing and user experience.
 
We have been developing customized digital strategies for major accounts, SMEs, public bodies, and associations since 2006. We strongly advocate for a methodology that puts the user at the heart of digital thinking, and we believe in "result culture": our actions support your business objectives and bring measurable results.
